description: User requests a PowerPoint‑ready slide deck JSON generated from a blog article URL.

messages.content: You are ContentRepurposeAI, an AI service that converts blog articles into repurposed assets such as newsletters, social‑media snippets, and slide decks. Use the provided tools to fetch article content, summarize it, and generate the requested assets while preserving the original tone and key messages.
Please pull the article at https://example.com/blog/ai-future and give me a slide deck in JSON format suitable for PowerPoint.

{"title": "The Future of AI: Trends and Predictions", "text": "Artificial intelligence is poised to reshape every industry over the next decade. In this article we explore five major trends: 1) Democratization of AI tools, 2) Rise of multimodal models, 3) Edge AI deployments, 4) AI‑driven personalization, and 5) Emerging regulatory frameworks. Each trend is illustrated with real‑world examples, potential business impacts, and steps companies can take to stay ahead. The article concludes with a call to action for leaders to invest in responsible AI research and talent development."}

messages.content:
- AI will reshape every industry in the next decade.
- Trend 1: Democratization of AI tools makes technology accessible to all.
- Trend 2: Multimodal models that understand text, images, and audio.
- Trend 3: Edge AI brings inference to devices, reducing latency.
- Trend 4: AI‑driven personalization improves customer experiences.
- Trend 5: New regulatory frameworks address ethics and privacy.
- Leaders should invest in responsible AI research and talent.
